title: Sanctions Threaten U.K.’s Position as Playground for Russian Oligarchs
sub_head: First penalties on Russians in response to troop movements into breakaway regions of Ukraine could hit what some call ‘Moscow-on-Thames’
body:
LONDON—The U.K. is threatening to ratchet up pressure on the Kremlin thousands of miles away in the rich enclaves of London.
For decades, Russia’s ultrarich have flocked to the city once dubbed Moscow-on-Thames, snapping up high-end houses, sending children to elite private schools and leveraging the capital’s status as a global financial hub.
